FROM python:alpine 

LABEL maintainer="Simon BÃ¤rlocher <s.baerlocher@sbaerlocher.ch>" 

# Install packages 
RUN apk add --update \  
openssl-dev \  
gcc \  
libffi-dev \  
musl-dev \  
make \  
git \  
&& rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* 

# Install ansible 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir ansible

# Install ansible-lint 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir ansible-lint

# Install yamllint 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir yamllint

CMD ["python3"]
